meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Operculina, native to tropical regions.
meanings.sent1: The turbith in the garden has beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent2: Many tropical regions have the turbith plant growing wild.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys in the jungle love to swing from the turbith vines.
meanings.sent4: Her love for nature was as deep-rooted as the turbith plant.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the turbith make it stand out in the forest.

meanings.definition: A purgative drug made from the root of the turbith plant.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed a dose of turbith to cleanse the system.
meanings.sent2: In ancient times, turbith was used as a powerful remedy.
meanings.sent3: Taking too much turbith can lead to unexpected results.
meanings.sent4: The turbith root worked like magic, clearing out all impurities.
meanings.sent5: The effects of turbith were swift and effective in aiding digestion.
